attributes.action: Replace God Save The Queen as the National Anthem with the theme tune fron The Archers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With respect the current anthem could be described as somewhat 'dull'. Imagine 90,000 fans at Wembley, 80,000 at Twickenham, Olympic medallists on the podium at 2012 (hopefully), all going "la la la la la la laa, la la la la la laa etc". Thats right, no lyrics required.
A National Anthem to put a smile on your face... guaranteed.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
